channel.title: Epicurus RSPS How to add a new item server sided?
channel.description:
Ok I have searched through all of the files in the server (Epicurus) and I can not find an actual .cfg file for the items all there are is .dat item files. and when I open the item editor I cannot add, nor delete any items only edit the stats and price or if its stackable etc. Would anyone help me out with this? I am trying to add a few more "Packages" to the Token exchange to neaten up the Donator Shop. I have the item's in the shop and it shows it all server sided but if you click on "Value" it only shows the price and the name doesn't come up. So would someone please help me with this?
[url=http://prntscr.com/wlult]http://prntscr.com/wlult[/url] [url=http://prntscr.com/wluo7]http://prntscr.com/wluo7[/url] [url=http://prntscr.com/wlurk]http://prntscr.com/wlurk[/url] [url=http://prntscr.com/wluu5]http://prntscr.com/wluu5[/url]

item.title: Epicurus RSPS How to add a new item server sided?
item.dc:creator: @k2_k0 k2 k0
item.description:
@k2_k0 wrote:

Ahh okay I was wondering why and I couldn’t find anywhere to add it, but did you just use null items and change them and there id’s? That’s what I have done for now and it has worked fine.

Read full topic
item.source: Epicurus RSPS How to add a new item server sided?

item.title: Epicurus RSPS How to add a new item server sided?
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

I never got around to adding that functionality to the editor. I will in the future.
